Read in the data
```{r}
damages.df <- readr::read_csv(here::here("data", "stormData.csv"))

damages.df <- damages.df |>
  dplyr::mutate(Date = lubridate::parse_date_time(damages.df$`LANDFALL DATE`,
                           orders = 'mdy'),
                Year = lubridate::year(Date),
                YearName = paste0(Year, `STORM NAME`)) |>
  dplyr::filter(Year >= 1987)
```

Insured damages (losses) are .5 of the total economic damages.
